subject: Football
lead_paragraph: On Sunday in the wild-card round at Minnesota, Brian Dawkins’s hammering talent will be vital if the Eagles are to contain Adrian Peterson, who led the N.F.L. with 1,760 rushing yards.
snippet: On Sunday in the wild-card round at Minnesota, Brian Dawkins’s hammering talent will be vital if the Eagles are to contain Adrian Peterson, who led the N.F.L. with 1,760 rushing yards.
